definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

sentences.english: I graduate in Nanjing finance and economics university accounting department on 2005.
sentences.chinese: 我于2005年毕业于南京财经大学会计学系。

sentences.english: to administer and coordinate relevant work of the accounting colleges directly affiliated to the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 管理和协调中央直属会计学院的有关工作等。

sentences.english: They can identify and clearly express the application accounting principle situation.
sentences.chinese: 能辩识出可应用会计学原理的场合，并能清楚表达。

sentences.english: He likes computer programming. He doesn't like accounting.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢计算机程序编制，而不喜欢会计学。

sentences.english: Accounting is an important specialized fundamental course for the non-financial accounting profession compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 会计学是非财会专业必修的重要专业基础课。

sentences.english: Near 70 Accounting students have joined as mentees.
sentences.chinese: 大约七十名会计学系学生参加成为计划成员。

sentences.english: Only simpletons think that accounting labels cause the world to move.
sentences.chinese: 只有傻瓜才认为是会计学要素推动了世界的前进。

sentences.english: John majored in accounting and business  administration in Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 约翰在哈佛上学时学的是会计学和商业管理。

sentences.english: This is the Faculty of Commerce and Accountancy building.
sentences.chinese: 这是法政大学的商业与会计学系大楼。

sentences.english: I will graduate from Peking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

sentences.english: The woman wanted to earn an accounting degree but was too shy to take classes.
sentences.chinese: 这位妇女想获得一个会计学学位，但她害怕去上课。

sentences.english: Irm taking four courses, one of which is accounting.
sentences.chinese: 咱选学四门课，其中一门是会计学。

sentences.english: This would also explain why in the field of accountancy there is a general increase in the number of female accountants.
sentences.chinese: 这也说明了会计学领域女会计师人数普遍增加的原因。

sentences.english: Set in 2003 Shanghai Lixin University of Commerce.
